name: RallX
description:
RallX is a multiplayer mobile friendly arcade game inspired by Namco's Rally-X, where each player drives a car and has to collect the flags scattered around the maze.

While the graphics and the game map resembles the original, all the other parts of the game has been made from zero using javascript and the Pixi.js library.

Once in the welcome page you'll have to choose your player name and color. In this page you'll be offered with a room id which url you may copy and share with your friends (limited to 4 players for room).

The car maybe managed with the onscreen controller or with the arrows keys using a keyboard.

You also may play this game alone, but it'll be not as funny as playing with others :D
